Html:
Hi,

 need to quote my bibliography using the separator ":" instead of "p." for the pages reference.

Hoe can I change teh style permanently in order to do this.

thanks in advance
Which style? And where does they have to be changed? In-text citations only or bibliography as well?

I only need it on in-text citations.

I´m using ISO 690 with first element and date, but I think it appears in all styles.

thanks

That's a Microsoft style. I don't really mess around with these anymore because it is just too hard to cover every possible exception.

That said, for in-text citations, you probably have to look at the variable "ppPages". There the "p." prefix gets added. And look wherever the "ppPages" element gets displayed to change the space after the year into a ":".
thanks for your approach. it´s a start.
